StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateTBSData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PrecommissionID int = 0, @NWAID int, @TBSClass int, @TBSFY int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
--- GET THE TBS ID DECLARE @TBSID int SELECT @TBSID = TBS_ID FROM TBS WHERE CLASS = @TBSClass AND FY = @TBSFY
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRECOMMISSION_DATA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN --- UPDATE TBS DATA UPDATE PRECOMMISSION_DATA SET TBS_ID = @TBSID, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID
END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT TBS DATA INSERT INTO PRECOMMISSION_DATA (NWA_ID, TBS_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWAID, @TBSID, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
